\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{[]}}{}{}{}{}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\mathit{\overline{block} }  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{block}}{}{}{}{}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\mathit{\overline{block} }  ;  \mathit{\overline{block} }'}{}{}{}{}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \mathit{\overline{block} }  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottfheader}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{fheader}}{::=}{\ottcom{function header}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{typ} \, \ottmv{id}  \ottsym{(}  \mathit{\overline{arg} } \, \ottnt{varg}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{fheader}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottfdec}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{fdec}}{::=}{\ottcom{function declaration}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{declare} \, \ottnt{fheader}}{}{}{}{}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{fdec}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottfdef}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{fdef}}{::=}{\ottcom{function definition}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{define} \, \ottnt{fheader}  \ottsym{\{}  \mathit{\overline{block} }  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{fdef}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottoptXXfdec}{
\ottrulehead{\mathit{opt_{fdec} }}{::=}{\ottcom{option fdec}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{none}}{}{}{}{}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{fdec}}{}{}{}{}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \mathit{opt_{fdec} }  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottoptXXfdef}{
\ottrulehead{\mathit{opt_{fdef} }}{::=}{\ottcom{option fdef}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{none}}{}{}{}{}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{fdef}}{}{}{}{}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \mathit{opt_{fdef} }  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottnamedt}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{namedt}}{::=}{\ottcom{named type}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{id}  =  \ottnt{typ}}{}{}{}{}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{namedt}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottnamedts}{
\ottrulehead{\mathit{\overline{namedt} }}{::=}{\ottcom{namedts}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{[]}}{}{}{}{}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\mathit{\overline{namedt} }  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{namedt}}{}{}{}{}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\mathit{\overline{namedt} }  ;  \mathit{\overline{namedt} }'}{}{}{}{}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \mathit{\overline{namedt} }  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottgvarXXspec}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{gvar\_spec}}{::=}{\ottcom{gvar spec}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{global}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{global}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{constant}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{constant}}}

\newcommand{\ottgvar}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{gvar}}{::=}{\ottcom{global variables}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{id}  =  \ottnt{gvar\_spec} \, \ottnt{typ} \, \ottnt{const} \, \ottmv{align}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{intro}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{id}  =  \ottnt{gvar\_spec} \, \ottnt{typ}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{external}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{gvar}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottidXXbinding}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{id\_binding}}{::=}{\ottcom{id binding}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{none}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{none}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{cmd}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{cmd}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{phinode}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{phinode}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{terminator}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{terminator}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{gvar}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{gvar}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{fdec}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{fdec}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{arg}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{arg}}}

\newcommand{\ottproduct}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{product}}{::=}{\ottcom{prodoct}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{gvar}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{global variable}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{fdec}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{function declaration}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{fdef}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{function definition}}}

\newcommand{\ottproducts}{
\ottrulehead{\mathit{\overline{product} }}{::=}{\ottcom{products}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{[]}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{nil}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\mathit{\overline{product} }  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{product}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{cons}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \mathit{\overline{product} }  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottmodule}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{module}}{::=}{\ottcom{module}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\mathit{\overline{layout} } \, \mathit{\overline{namedt} } \, \mathit{\overline{product} }}{}{}{}{\ottcom{prods}}\\ 
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{module}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottmodules}{
\ottrulehead{\mathit{\overline{module} }}{::=}{\ottcom{modules}}\\

\newcommand{\ottsystem}{

\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXtypXXint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{sz}  \ottsym{>}  \ottsym{0}}%
}{
\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottkw{int} \, \ottmv{sz}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_typ\_int}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXtypXXfloatpoint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottnt{floating\_point}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_typ\_floatpoint}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXtypXXvoid}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottkw{void}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_typ\_void}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXtypXXlabel}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottkw{label}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_typ\_label}}{}%
}}

}{
\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottkw{metadata}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_typ\_metadate}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXtypXXopaque}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottkw{opaque}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_typ\_opaque}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXtypXXfunction}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{isValidReturnTyp} \, \ottnt{typ}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottnt{typ}}%
\ottpremise{\ottcomp{\ottkw{isValidArgumentTyp} \, \ottnt{typ_{\ottmv{j}}}}{\ottmv{j}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottcomp{\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottnt{typ_{\ottmv{j}}}}{\ottmv{j}}}%
}{
\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottnt{typ}  \ottsym{(} \, \ottcomp{\ottnt{typ_{\ottmv{j}}}}{\ottmv{j}} \, \ottnt{varg}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_typ\_function}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXtypXXstructure}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottcomp{\ottkw{isValidElementTyp} \, \ottnt{typ_{\ottmv{j}}}}{\ottmv{j}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottcomp{\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottnt{typ_{\ottmv{j}}}}{\ottmv{j}}}%
}{
\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottsym{\{} \, \ottcomp{\ottnt{typ_{\ottmv{j}}}}{\ottmv{j}} \, \ottsym{\}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_typ\_structure}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXtypXXarray}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottnt{typ}}%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{isValidElementTyp} \, \ottnt{typ}}%
}{
\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{sz}  \ottsym{*}  \ottnt{typ}  \ottsym{]}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_typ\_array}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXtypXXpointer}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottnt{typ}}%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{isValidElementTyp} \, \ottnt{typ}}%
}{
\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottnt{typ}  \ottsym{*}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_typ\_pointer}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXtypXXnamedt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{lookupTypViaTIDFromSystem} \, \ottnt{system} \, \ottmv{id}  =  \mathit{opt_{typ} }}%
}{
\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottmv{id}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_typ\_namedt}}{}%
}}

\end{ottdefnblock}}

\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXconstXXtruncXXint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXconstXXbitcast}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{system}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-c}  \ottnt{const}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{typ_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottnt{typ_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{  \ottsym{Typ.getPrimitiveSizeInBits}  \ottnt{typ_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  =  \ottmv{sz_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \wedge  \ottsym{Typ.getPrimitiveSizeInBits}  \ottnt{typ_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  =  \ottmv{sz_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \wedge   \ottmv{sz_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  =  \ottmv{sz_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
\ottpremise{ \ottkw{isPointerTyp} \, \ottnt{typ_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \mathit{iff}  \ottkw{isPointerTyp} \, \ottnt{typ_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
\ottpremise{  (  \neg  \ottkw{isAggregateTyp} \, \ottnt{typ_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \!)   \wedge   (  \neg  \ottkw{isAggregateTyp} \, \ottnt{typ_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \!)  }%
}{
\ottnt{system}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-c}  \ottkw{ptrtoint} \, \ottnt{const} \, \ottkw{to} \, \ottnt{typ_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{typ_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_const\_bitcast}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXconstXXgep}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{system}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-c}  \ottnt{const}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{typ}  \ottsym{*}}%
\ottpremise{\ottcomp{ \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-c}  \ottnt{const_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottkw{int} \, \ottmv{sz}  \wedge  \ottmv{sz}  =  \ottsym{32} }{\ottmv{j}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{getConstGEPTyp} \, \ottcomp{\ottnt{const_{\ottmv{j}}}}{\ottmv{j}} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{typ}  \ottsym{*}  \ottsym{)}  =  \ottnt{typ'}}%

\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXoperandXXintro}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{insn} \, \in \, \ottnt{fdef}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{block}}%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{getInsnOperands} \, \ottnt{insn}  =  \mathit{\{id\} }}%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{id'}  \in  \mathit{\{id\} } }%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{lookupBlockViaIDFromFdef} \, \ottnt{fdef} \, \ottmv{id'}  =  \ottnt{block'}}%
\ottpremise{ \neg  \ottkw{isPhiNode} \, \ottnt{insn} }%
\ottpremise{ (   \ottkw{insnDominates} \, \ottmv{id'} \, \ottnt{insn} \, \ottnt{block}  \vee  \ottkw{blockStrictDominates} \, \ottnt{fdef} \, \ottnt{block'} \, \ottnt{block}   \vee   (  \neg   ( \ottkw{isReachableFromEntry} \, \ottnt{fdef} \, \ottnt{block} \!)   \!)   \!) }%
}{
\ottnt{fdef}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{block}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{insn}  \vdash  \ottmv{id'}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_operand\_intro}}{}%
}}

\ottpremise{\ottkw{getInsnTyp} \, \ottnt{insn}  =  \ottnt{typ}}%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{typ}  \ottsym{=t=}  \ottkw{void}  \vee  \ottkw{isFirstClassTyp} \, \ottnt{typ} }%
\ottpremise{  (  \neg  \ottnt{typ}  \ottsym{=t=}  \ottkw{metadata}  \!)   \vee  \ottkw{isCallInsn} \, \ottnt{insn} }%
\ottpremise{  ( \ottkw{isPointerTyp} \, \ottnt{typ} \!)   \mathit{implies}   (  \ottkw{getPointerEltTyp} \, \ottnt{typ}  =  \ottnt{typ'}  \wedge   (  \neg  \ottnt{typ'}  \ottsym{=t=}  \ottkw{metadata}  \!)   \!)  }%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{getInsnOperands} \, \ottnt{insn}  =  \mathit{\{id\} }}%
\ottpremise{\mathit{\{id\} }  <-> \, \ottcomp{\ottmv{id_{\ottmv{j}}}}{\ottmv{j}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottcomp{\ottnt{fdef}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{block}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{insn}  \vdash  \ottmv{id_{\ottmv{j}}}}{\ottmv{j}}}%

\ottpremise{\ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{fdef}  \vdash  \ottnt{value_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottkw{int} \, \ottmv{sz_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{ ( \ottmv{sz_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  <  \ottmv{sz_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ) }%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{fdef}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{block}  \vdash_{i}  \ottmv{id}  =  \ottkw{sext} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottkw{int} \, \ottmv{sz_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)} \, \ottnt{value_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{to} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottkw{int} \, \ottmv{sz_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{module}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{fdef}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{block}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-ext}  \ottmv{id}  =  \ottkw{sext} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottkw{int} \, \ottmv{sz_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)} \, \ottnt{value_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{to} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottkw{int} \, \ottmv{sz_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_ext\_s}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXextXXfp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXinsnXXphi}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottcomp{\ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{fdef}  \vdash  \ottnt{value_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{typ}}{\ottmv{j}}}%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{typ}  \ottsym{=t=}  \ottkw{void}  \vee  \ottkw{isFirstClassTyp} \, \ottnt{typ} }%
\ottpremise{ \neg  \ottnt{typ}  \ottsym{=t=}  \ottkw{metadata} }%
\ottpremise{  ( \ottkw{isPointerTyp} \, \ottnt{typ} \!)   \mathit{implies}   (  \ottkw{getPointerEltTyp} \, \ottnt{typ}  =  \ottnt{typ'}  \wedge   (  \neg  \ottnt{typ'}  \ottsym{=t=}  \ottkw{metadata}  \!)   \!)  }%
\ottpremise{\texttt{insnInFdefBlockB }\ottmv{id}  = \, \ottkw{phi} \, \ottnt{typ} \, \ottcomp{\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{value_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{l_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{]}}{\ottmv{j}}\texttt{ }\ottnt{fdef}\texttt{ }\ottnt{block}\texttt{ = true }}%
\ottpremise{\texttt{wf\_phinode }\ottnt{fdef}\texttt{ }\ottnt{block}\texttt{ }\ottmv{id}  = \, \ottkw{phi} \, \ottnt{typ} \, \ottcomp{\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{value_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{l_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{]}}{\ottmv{j}}\texttt{ }}%

\newcommand{\ottdefnwfXXprod}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{module}  \vdash  \ottnt{product}$}{\ottcom{$\ottnt{product}$ is well-formed w.r.t. $\ottnt{module}$ $\ottnt{system}$}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulewfXXprodXXglobalXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulewfXXprodXXfunctionXXdec{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulewfXXprodXXfunctionXXdef{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsJwfXXprod}{
\ottdefnwfXXprod{}}

}{

{\ottdrulename{wf\_prods\_nil}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXprodsXXcons}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{module}  \vdash  \mathit{\overline{product} }}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{module}  \vdash  \ottnt{product}}%
}{
\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{module}  \vdash  \mathit{\overline{product} }  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{product}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_prods\_cons}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnwfXXprods}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{module}  \vdash  \mathit{\overline{product} }$}{\ottcom{$\mathit{\overline{product} }$ is well-formed w.r.t. $\ottnt{module}$ $\ottnt{system}$}}

\newcommand{\ottdrulewfXXmoduleXXintro}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\vdash  \mathit{\overline{namedt} }}%
\ottpremise{ \ottsym{(}  \mathit{\overline{layout} } \, \mathit{\overline{namedt} } \, \mathit{\overline{product} }  \ottsym{)}  \in  \ottnt{system} }%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{(}  \mathit{\overline{layout} } \, \mathit{\overline{namedt} } \, \mathit{\overline{product} }  \ottsym{)}  \vdash  \mathit{\overline{product} }}%
}{
\ottnt{intrinsic\_funs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{system}  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \mathit{\overline{layout} } \, \mathit{\overline{namedt} } \, \mathit{\overline{product} }  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{wf\_module\_intro}}{}%
}}

{\ottdrulename{wf\_system\_intro}}{}%
